medicalHistory.title: Patient has pain in abdomen
medicalHistory.historyOfPresentingComplaints: The patient presents with severe abdominal pain and vomiting for the past 24 hours.
medicalHistory.historyOfPresentingIllness: Mr. Doe reports that the abdominal pain started suddenly yesterday evening...

systemicHistory.centralNervousSystem: Clear and alert. No signs of neurological deficits.
systemicHistory.gastrointestinalSystem: Abdomen tender on palpation in the right lower quadrant. No rebound tenderness or guarding.
systemicHistory.genitourinarySystem: No complaints of urinary frequency or urgency. No hematuria.

medicalHistory.pastMedicalHistory: The patient has a history of hypertension controlled with medication.
medicalHistory.drugHistory: The patient is currently taking Amlodipine 5mg daily for hypertension.
medicalHistory.occupationalHistory: The patient works as a software engineer with prolonged sitting hours.

generalPhysicalExamination.Notes: Overall the patient has mild headache

examination.centralNervousSystem: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time.
examination.gastrointestinalSystem: Abdomen tender on palpation in the right lower quadrant. No rebound tenderness or guarding.
